Title: Uttam Singh | Personal Webpage
Name: Uttam Singh
Description: I am a 25 yrs old lad currently employed as a Software Engineer at VISA. I am a 2022 Master's of Science (M.Sc) Graduate in Mathematics with a Bachelor of Engineering (B.E) degree in Computer Science from BITS pilani
I am born and brought up in Ranchi, Jharkhand, where I did my primary schooling from Kairali School (till 10th) and completed my secondary education from JVM Shyamali (11-12th).
A professional athlete this side, have played cricket representing teams in district & state level tournaments.
AboutContent: I am a learner, in a software developement intern role at present.
More than a fan of cricket I have played for numerous teams , my district(Ranchi), and synched the athlete's rush to achieve onto my worklife
I am passionate about System design, specifically Distributed Systems, and its analysis of fault and failures while scaling the web application.
Fast forward 2 years from now I aspire to become confident of my skills and should have more clarity of my role in projects I am contributing to.
